name: unmai-backend
description: unmai.ai Backend - AI-powered content verification and analysis

scripts.test:env: node -e "require('dotenv').config(); console.log('Environment check passed'); console.log('GCP_PROJECT_ID:', process.env.GCP_PROJECT_ID ? '[OK] SET' : '[ERROR] MISSING'); console.log('GEMINI_API_KEY:', process.env.GEMINI_API_KEY ? '[OK] SET' : '[ERROR] MISSING');"
scripts.kill:port: lsof -ti:3001 | xargs kill -9 || echo 'No process found on port 3001'
